title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, February 14, 2020
description: Today is Saint Valentine’s Day, named for a Roman priest who performed clandestine weddings in defiance of Emperor Claudius II’s law forbidding marriage.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is Saint Valentine’s Day, named for a Roman priest who performed clandestine weddings in defiance of Emperor Claudius II’s law forbidding marriage.
